title: Give the complete path of the data and cache data on local disk — getDataPath
code: getDataPath(   path,   ...,   use_cache = TRUE,   cfg = loadConfig(),   root = cfg$data[[cfg$data$mode]],   cache = Sys.getenv("PKG_DATA_CACHE", file.path(dirname(tempdir()),     utils::packageName())) )

title: Read package configuration — loadConfig
text: Read default package configuration complete eventual user config.

title: Read package configuration — loadConfig
code: loadConfig(   userFile = "config.yml",   pathDefaultCfg = system.file("config.yml", package = utils::packageName()),   ... )

title: Read package configuration — loadConfig
text: userFile location user config YML file (Use NULL empty character ignore) pathDefaultCfg location default configuration (located "inst/config.yml" package default) ... parameters file sent config::get config value

title: Read package configuration — loadConfig
